name: Kitsune Style
text: Your quick movement and trickery allow you to catch opponents off guard.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick.
benefit: While using this style, you can attempt to perform a dirty trick in place of an attack at the end of a charge.
text_zh: 如一道流星划过对手，你的招数让他晕头转向。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招APG。
benefit_zh: 当处于本流派的架势时，你可以在冲锋攻击时以一次阴招战技攻击取代正常的攻击。
